citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:30 - 1 pm
on 02/16/2016. During that time, the inspector waited at the facility and called the available number on file leaving a
message.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:30 - 1 pm
on 02/16/2016. During that time, the inspector waited at the facility and called the available number on file leaving a
message.
